2017, 2018 & 2019

A speakeasy style Bar housed in the most beautiful heritage building in Cathedral Square, Christchurch. Just down the hall you will find Parlour Cocktail Bar, Woodwards Barber Shop & the OGB Suites. Overlooking Cathedral Square is a charming outdoor Courtyard. Ol' fashioned service, Live Music and carefully crafted food & drinks. Open every day, 11.00am - 1am.
